name: lms-backend
description: Learning Management System Backend - Microservices Architecture

scripts.install:all: npm run install:services && npm run install:gateway && npm run install:workers && npm run install:shared
scripts.install:services: cd services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../skill-service && npm install && cd ../matching-service && npm install && cd ../session-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:skill" "npm run dev:matching" "npm run dev:session" "npm run dev:payment" "npm run dev:notification"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:services && npm run test:gateway && npm run test:workers
scripts.test:services: cd services/auth-service && npm test && cd ../user-service && npm test && cd ../skill-service && npm test && cd ../matching-service && npm test && cd ../session-service && npm test && cd ../payment-service && npm test && cd ../notification-service && npm test && cd ../..
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:services && npm run lint:gateway && npm run lint:workers
scripts.lint:services: cd services/auth-service && npm run lint && cd ../user-service && npm run lint && cd ../skill-service && npm run lint && cd ../matching-service && npm run lint && cd ../session-service && npm run lint && cd ../payment-service && npm run lint && cd ../notification-service && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.lint:gateway: cd gateway && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.lint:workers: cd workers && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run clean:services && npm run clean:gateway && npm run clean:workers
scripts.clean:services: cd services/auth-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../user-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../skill-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../matching-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../session-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../payment-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../notification-service && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../..
